lpmodes

Import and ExportÔÉÅ

Details of modes solved can be exported as CSV file. Assuming we have a list of modes stored in modes, they can be saved to a file filename = example.csv using:

lpmodes.modes_to_csv(modes, filename)

The modes can also be reloaded by:

modes = lpmodes.csv_to_modes(filename)

By default, a header line is included in the CSV, pass header = False as a keyword argument to not include a header (and also when loading in from a file with no header).
